translation.welcome: Welcome to the game! To start the game, please reply with your full name.
translation.promptEmail:
Thank you.
Please send your business email address next. We will then send you an email with a one-time password (using Twilio Verify & SendGrid).
translation.welcomeNoLeadCollection: Welcome to the game! By placing a bet, you agree that we can contact you for the purpose of this game. All data will be deleted after the event.
translation.invalidEmail: Sorry, this is not a valid email address.
translation.sentEmail:
We have sent you an email with a verification code. Please reply with the code we sent to your email address.
 If you did not receive the email, please check your spam folder or enter a new email address.
translation.verificationFailed: Sorry, the verification code is incorrect. Please try again or enter a new email address.
translation.betsNotAccepted: The wheel is already spinning. We cannot accept your bet anymore.
translation.gameEnded: The game is over. Thank you for participating!
translation.maxBetsReached: Sorry, you have already placed the maximum number of bets.
translation.betPlaced: Thank you. We have received your bet on "{{messageContent}}".
translation.winnerCallSmallPrize: <Response><Say>Congratulations! You bet on the right field and won. Stop by the Twilio booth to claim your prize!</Say></Response>
translation.winnerCallRafflePrize: <Response><Say>Congratulations! You won the grand prize and can claim your prize at the Twilio booth!</Say></Response>
translation.winnerMessageRafflePrize: Congratulations! You won the grand prize and can claim your prize at the Twilio booth!
translation.winnerMessageRaffleQualification:
Congratulations! You are now qualified for the prize!

PS: Did you know this game is open source? Check it out at https://github.com/twilio-samples/wheel-of-twilio/
translation.winnerMessageSmallPrize:
Congratulations! You bet on the right field and won. Stop by the Twilio booth to claim your prize.

PS: Did you know this game is open source? Check it out at https://github.com/twilio-samples/wheel-of-twilio/
translation.winnerMessageBothPrizes:
Congratulations! You bet on the right field and won. Stop by the Twilio booth to claim your prize. You are also automatically qualified for the grand prize!

PS: Did you know this game is open source? Check it out at https://github.com/twilio-samples/wheel-of-twilio/
translation.loser:
Sorry, you lost! The winning field was "{{winningWedge}}". 
Better luck next time!

PS: Did you know this game is open source? Check it out at https://github.com/twilio-samples/wheel-of-twilio/
translation.alreadyPlayedAndQualified: Congrats, you already guessed the right field in a previous round.
translation.alreadyPlayedNotClaimedSmallPrize: Congrats, you already won. Stop by the Twilio booth to claim your prize!
translation.prizePickup:
Enjoy your prize. We hope you enjoyed playing the game!

Sign up for a free Twilio account to build your own interactive games ðŸ‘¾ 

https://twilio.com/try-twilio
translation.alreadyPlayedPrizeClaimed: Enjoy your prize. Feel free to visit the Twilio booth to chat with us about our Customer Engagement Platform.
translation.catchAllError: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
translation.roundFull: Sorry, the round is full. Please wait for the next round.
translation.userRemoved: Your phone number has been removed from the participant list. If you would like to participate again, please send a message.
